attributes.title: No hope
attributes.review: I downloaded this to try and see if maybe our president had better plans for moving forward but clearly not

attributes.title: The app is horrible
attributes.review: I tried to be reasonable my trumps ideas but when the roots started happening I had enough of it. Trump needs to be out of the president role and back to his life where he didn’t ruin people’s lives

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: this app is TERRIBLE!! right when i downloaded it a huge carrot 🥕 popped up on my screen!!😾😾😾😾😾😾 and then sure enough my cat died. the app is so slow it took hours to download. and when i try to use it my phone goes crazy. DON’T DOWNLOAD THIS APP! (get tiktok) 👁👄👁

attributes.title: Terrible!!!!!!!🛑🛑
attributes.review: It took FORWVER to download and I had great connection it was absolutely AMAZING great awesome fantastic connection. And when it opened after like 3 days IT TRIED TO MAKE ME PUT MY NUMBWE AO THEY COULD STALK ME! Will not be downloading again absolutely Terrible I wish I could put -8 stars :( #anybodybuttrumpfor2020!!

attributes.title: VIRUS
attributes.review: the app downloaded quick, but after it downloaded it started making my glitch & it started getting hot , i don’t know if it’s a virus. i would not download this app. twitter is way better source of info!

attributes.title: TikTok lives matter
attributes.review: I went on this app to see why I should even need to look at this orange of a person and could not find one reason also looking at this orange almost made me have a stroke point proven.

attributes.title: This app is absolutely terrible!! 🤬
attributes.review:
This app is the definition of terrible!!! It took weeks download and after downloading it was useless!! This app needs to be REMOVED from the App Store immediately!! 

Thank you for your time!

attributes.title: WHATEVER YOU DO DONT DOWNLOAD THIS
attributes.review: I literally have no words to describe just how bad this app was. Barely notifies you when it says it will, gives links that don’t even open or if they do the cite is blocked AND I got a virus from one of the links. Absolute nightmare.

attributes.title: Yikes
attributes.review: Absolutely terrible quality.. not sure who would even want to upload an app this poorly designed. Wish there was an option to put 0 stars!

attributes.title: DON’T WASTE YOUR TIME 💅✨
attributes.review: This app is absolutely insane. I tried to get into it but it glitched. My 7 year old sister came into the room and fainted at the sight of the president. My phone overheated so much it was smoking!! I almost broke my phone! This is the worst app I’ve ever seen..
